sentences.en: A mobile population needs rentable homes.
sentences.cn: 一个移动性人口需要的就是能够租得起的房子。

sentences.en: Every country pavilion in Expo 2005 Aichi was rentable.
sentences.cn: 2005爱知世博会各参展国均采用租赁式展馆.

sentences.en: In 2009 the company will continue to increase rentable area are protected.
sentences.cn: 在2009年公司可出租面积增长仍将有保障.

sentences.en: In 2012,the company will continue to increase rentable area.
sentences.cn: 2012年，公司可出租面积将持续增长。

sentences.en: It will help to optimize each unit's search for underused and rentable spectrum.
sentences.cn: 这项技术可协助每个装置寻找使用率低与可利用的最适合频谱.

sentences.en: Taller buildings also tended to taper inwards, further reducing rentable space; the cost of moving materials and people also soars.
sentences.cn: 更高建筑的内部也开始变尖了，进一步减少了可出租的空间；运人运货的成本也直线上升。

sentences.en: There are a few dive shops in Massawa with rentable gear and boats to take you to the Dahlak Archipelago, which includes more than 200 islands and dozens of wrecks.
sentences.cn: 在马萨瓦有几家经营潜水的商店，有全套潜水装备出租，还有船只可载你前往达拉克群岛，周围有200多个岛屿和十几个沉船遗址。

words.tran_cn: 承租人；佃户；房东；（英）影片出租商

trans.tran_cn: 可出租的，可租借的，收益不错的
